While radical rightwingers are screaming their heads off and getting totally hysterical about the "death" tax, it is quite sobering to observe that every newborn child in the United States is instantly handed a bill for $28,000 to pay for Bush's tax cuts and excessive spending.
I've seen many babies born recently and I can honestly say I have not seen one of them get a bill from the government in the form of a tax
Billing and payment starts later. Geesh! They have to get jobs first, Steeeeve!

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  The Birth Tax
